description.value: Your team works together to set an enemy up for a vicious attack. Signal one squadmate who has an opponent within their reach. That ally can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Shove] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Reposition] an opponent as a free action. If their maneuver is successful and the target ends their movement adjacent to a different squadmate, the second squadmate can attempt a melee Strike against that target as a reaction.
